item.title: Thinking About Thinking
item.author: kelly.ripple@bti360.com (Kelly Ripple)
item.description: The relationship people have with information differs for each individual. This is an important concept for two reasons: personal growth and communication skills. A man named Anthony Gregorc did some research on Mind Styles. I’ll be discussing what I learned from identifying my own mind style in the hope that reading will help you in your own introspective journey. First things first, what are Mind Styles? Mind Styles categorize the way a person sequences and relates to information.
